title: In case, the land on which any S
clause_text: In case, the land on which any S.R.S. is undertaken is adjoining railway tracks, a boundary wall of minimum 2.40 m. in height shall be constructed on the side of the plot abutting the railway line. The Developer shall be required to furnish a No Objection Certificate (N.O.C.) from the concerned Railway Authority while seeking permission for construction of any building under the S.R.S. within a distance of 30 m. from the railway boundary. Any development on such plot shall be subject to the terms and conditions stipulated by the concerned Railway Authority.
